attributes.action: Allow pets owners to rent a property more easily
attributes.additional_details:
Pets can be use for personal therapy or keeping company. 
I personally found a place that allow animal so I decided to adopt a cat, but now I have to move out and there isn't a single landlord that allow me to have my pets with me. 
Some of the agency don't even reply or take that into consideration. 
All I'm asking is to banish this, and help pets owner who needs a new place to go to have the freedom to do so. Is not fair for pets owners to be refused a place
attributes.background: I'd like landlord to allow animal into the property we wish to rent. If necessary to pay an extra or higher deposit but not to banish or discriminate.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Ban Blanket No Pet Clauses in Tenancy Agreements & Leases.
